page.title: 13TEMPLE PARK LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The swimming pool was opened on 21st October 1977. The pool is always lovely and warm and has a wave machine and a super long slide nicknamed{The {AquaBlaster}.All the family have a good time because it has a shallow area like a beach getting gradually deeper to nearly 2 metres. There is a separate diving pool with a springboard and you can see the divers under the water by looking through a huge glass window on the poolside. Children from my school go to the Leisure Centre once every two weeks for our swimming lesson in a special learner pool next to the main one. In 1985 South Tyneside Council announced future plans for the land adjoining the pool, which includes a nature consevation area,providing horse-riding facilities and an informal woodland area.
